overview: A re-telling of Artemio Ricarte, a Filipino patriot who fought against the Spanish and later Americans. He was later supported by the Japanese during WWII. Nickname was "El Vibora" (the Viper).
tagline: IN HIS SEARCH FOR A MERCILESS KILLER, HE KILLED 99 LAWLESS MEN... BUT DID HE GET HIS MAN?
title: El Vibora
